subject: Automobile Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson sped into Nascar history, winning a record fourth straight Cup championship by making it through the season finale with a fifth-place finish.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson sped into Nascar history, winning a record fourth straight Cup championship by making it through the season finale with a fifth-place finish.
